tool.name: Hierarchical Cluster Heatmap

param.name: colorgradient
param.label: Optional - Input Color Gradient. See color options below.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Edit Datasets->Convert characters*
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Color Options:** Jet, red_white_blue, spectral, red_black_sky, red_black_blue, red_black_green, yellow_black_blue, seismic, green_white_purple, and coolwarm
-----
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool Generates a Hierarchical Cluster Heatmap from a Side-By-Side dataset and a design file. In the design file, samples must be called 'sampleID' and the sampleID classification variable should be called 'group'
-----
